passive.name: PERSEVERANCE
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) PERSEVERANCE
                                If Garen has not been struck by damage or enemy abilities within the last 5 seconds, he regenerates 1.3% missing Health per second (1% +0,3 ).

q.name: (Q) DECISIVE STRIKE
q.description:
(Q) DECISIVE STRIKE
 9/8.5/8/7.5s  
                                
                                
                                Breaks free from all slows, Briefly becoming immune to them for 0.5 seconds and gaining 35% of Movement Speed for 3 seconds.The next attack within 2/2.5/3/3.5 seconds is empowered to deal 66 physical damage (40/80/120/160 + 40% ) and silence the target for 1.5 seconds.

w.name: (W) COURAGE
w.description:
(W) COURAGE
 18/16/14/12s  
                                
                                
                                Passive: Gains 10% bonus  Magic Resist and  Armor.Active: Reduces incoming damage by 30% for 4 seconds. On cast, Garen gains 60% Tenacity for 1 second(s) and a shield that absorbs 65 damage (65/95/125/155 + 20% bonus ) for 2.5 seconds. The shield starts decaying after 1 second(s).

e.name: (E) JUDGMENT
e.description:
(E) JUDGMENT
 9s  
                                
                                
                                First cast: Rapidly spins his sword for 3 second(s), dealing 38 physical damage (15/19/23/27 + 35/40/45/50%  ) 8 time(s) over the duration. Every 4 levels, the number of spins increases by 1, up to 11 strikes. Judgment can be recast by tapping the ability button 1 second(s) after the first cast.Armor Shred: When a champion is hit by 6 strike(s), their Armor is shredded by 25% for 4.5 second(s). Every hit refreshes the effect duration. The target nearest to Garen takes 20% increased damage.Re-cast: Ends Judgment early and reduces its cooldown by the duration remaining.

r.name: (R) DEMACIAN JUSTICE
r.description:
(R) DEMACIAN JUSTICE
 70/65/60s  
                                
                                
                                Calls forth the might of Demacia to execute an enemy champion, dealing true damage equal to 150/250/350 plus 15% (15/20/25% + 0.12% bonus ) of the target's missing health. Nearby enemies take true damage equal to 75/125/175 plus 7.5% (7.5/10/12.5% + 0.06% bonus ) of their missing health.Deals a max 600 damage to epic monsters.

boots_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

boots_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
boots_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

situational_items_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

situational_items_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
situational_items_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

example_build_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

keystone_detailed.description: You and your nearby ally gain a shield when either of you would take damage from an enemy champion.

runes_detailed.description: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it for 4 seconds, dealing bonus damage.
After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal over time based on missing health.
